page.title: 09Fashion in Chobham
page.content: In 1985 most of the{fashionable shops have{pale colours}e.g pastel pink mint lilac and pastel yellow. Now girls wear light trousers, pale baggy shirts and a thick belt which is worn loosly.In the{sixties}people wore flares and{bellbottoms.}Some people say they have come back into fashion.The print on some clothes is splodges and flowers. Old people think fashionable things are for kids. In our area there are not any nice childrens clothes shops, no adults shops either. In Chobham there is not very many{punky people. {Hairstyles}have gone crazy these days. Styles like{skinhead and rat's tail are worn. Punks{gel}their hair and spray it various colours.Tattoo shops are about in London.
